description:
Kindaichi and Miyuki get the opportunity to go to a ski resort free of charge!  But then, trapped on a snowy mountain with no chance of escape, people start disappearing...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legendary Snow Demon Murders, File 1
Yuki Oni Densetsu Satsujin Jiken File. 1
雪鬼伝説殺人事件 File.1
